bio.text: I'm a 22-year-old software developer. Perfectionism and perseverance shape my work, while curiosity drives me through the world of technology and innovation. Beyond coding, I explore art and expressionism across different cultures, diving into animation and visual storytelling. The human mind fascinates me, pulling me toward psychology and philosophy. I love taking ideas and flipping them completely, seeing where spontaneous thinking takes me.
